channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiSOAR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiSOAR

item.title: CVE-2024-31493|2024-06-03T07:55:29.476Z -- Fortinet -- FortiSOAR
item.description: An improper removal of sensitive information before storage or transfer vulnerability [CWE-212] in FortiSOAR version 7.3.0, version 7.2.2 and below, version 7.0.3 and below may allow an authenticated low privileged user to read Connector passwords in plain-text via HTTP responses.
